page.title: 08HOME LIFE MEALS
page.content: THE OUSBY FAMILY HAVE CEREAL AND MILK FOR BREAKFAST AT 7-30 A.M. THEY HAVE DINNER AT 12 NOON. THEIR FAVOURITE DINNER IS CHICKEN,SWEETCORN AND ROAST POTATOES. AT 4 P.M. THEY TEA WITH CAKE AND SANDWICHES AND BISCUITS. AT 6-30 P.M. THEY HAVE A SUPPER. THE FAVOURITE CHOICE IS CHEESE GRILLED ON TOAST. MRS OUSBY GROWS VEGETABLES IN THE GARDEN AND COLLECTS EGGS FROM HER OWN HENS. THEIR MILK COMES FROM AN UNCLES FARM. MEAT AND TINNED FOOD COMES FROM NEWBIGGIN-ON-LUNE'S ONLY SHOP. ON LYNNE'S FARM THE MEAL TIMES ARE THE SAME. THEY EAT THEIR OWN EGGS,LAMB AND MILK.
